Go to Payment Methods settings section: Path to file to log payments through Payeer (for example, /payeer_orders.log)
column2: Path to file to log payments through Payeer (for example, /payeer_orders.log)

Go to Payment Methods settings section: If a path is not specified, the log is not written
column2: If a path is not specified, the log is not written

Go to Payment Methods settings section: url for payment in the system Payeer
column2: url for payment in the system Payeer

Go to Payment Methods settings section: Store ID, registered in the system PAYEER. It can be found in your account Payeer: Account -> My store -> Edit.
column2: Store ID, registered in the system PAYEER. It can be found in your account Payeer: Account -> My store -> Edit.

Go to Payment Methods settings section: the Secret key to the notification about the execution of the payment, which is used to verify the integrity of the received information, unequivocal identification of the sender. Must be the same private key specified by account Payeer: Account -> My store -> Edit.
column2: the Secret key to the notification about the execution of the payment, which is used to verify the integrity of the received information, unequivocal identification of the sender. Must be the same private key specified by account Payeer: Account -> My store -> Edit.

Go to Payment Methods settings section: Failed to make the payment through the system Payeer for the following reasons:
column2: Failed to make the payment through the system Payeer for the following reasons:

Go to Payment Methods settings section: - Do not match the digital signature
column2: - Do not match the digital signature

Go to Payment Methods settings section: - The payment status is not success
column2: - The payment status is not success

Go to Payment Methods settings section: - the ip address of the server is not trusted
column2: - the ip address of the server is not trusted

Go to Payment Methods settings section: Customer redirected to payment Gateway Payeer
column2: Customer redirected to payment Gateway Payeer

Go to Payment Methods settings section: The amount has been authorized and captured by Payeer.
column2: The amount has been authorized and captured by Payeer.
